page.title: 20Our Group
page.content:
This material was put together by the children and headmaster of Dame Anna Child's Endowed School, Whitton, Knighton,Powys. The children involved ranged from 7 to 11 years of age and were - Mark Williams,Carl Branford,Wayne Lewis,Ian Pawsey,Edward Morris.Sandra Deakins,Donna Thomas, Lorraine Williams,Cathy Gwilt,Cyriack Hooper, David Ross, Tom Shepherd, Doreen Griffiths,Jacqui Duggan, Brendan Branford, Gregory Olds, Dyfan Lewis, Chris Thomas,Rachel Owens, Suzie Powell, Duncan Gammon and Emma Mills.
Bryan Green, Headmaster.
